channel.title: Magneto Therapy – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: B-MAT
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: Bed Mat is a true mat made up of 4 interchangeable sections, each containing 4 solenoids. The Bed Mat has been devised to be placed on a traditional bed mattress, enabling users to perform magnetotherapy treatments during sleep. Bed Mat takes benefit from magnetic fields to treat the main musculoskeletal disorders such as arthrosis, osteoporosis, arthritis, etc.
item.content:encoded:
B-Mat is available in three versions:
 B-Mat 200 the mat is made up of two active sections containing 8 solenoids, and of two neutral sections without solenoids. The sections containing solenoids can be shifted to different body parts according to individual needs.
 B-Mat 300 The mat is made up of three active sections containing 12 solenoids, and of one neutral section without solenoids. The sections containing solenoids can be shifted to different body parts according to individual needs.
 B-Mat 400 the mat is made up of four active sections containing 16 solenoids.

item.title: MAGNUM L
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: · GAUSS POWER: 160 Gauss peak; 60 Gauss average; adjustable power in steps of 5 · DISPLAY: a large and BACKLIT screen permits to display all the parameters. Controls are extremely easy and make the device very user-friendly · TYPE OF THERAPY: magnetotherapy device with lowfrequency pulsed magnetic fields · NEW GENERATION SOLENOID: possibility to treat pathologies in deep or superficial way thanks to its specialsolenoid created by Globus research in collaboration with the most important physiotherapy centers. It also permits to treat large areas such as the back or smaller areas such as the wrist · 8 PRESET PROGRAMS · OUTPUT CHANNELS: 1 channel · POWER SUPPLY: mains 220V
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Channels: 1
Emitted intensity: 160 total Gauss
peak, 60 Gauss average.
Power supply: mains 220V
Large BACKLIT graphic display and
EASY-PRO navigation system with
joypad
Class II A device
In compliance with the directive

EQUIPMENT
1 carrying case
1 flexible solenoid
1 Magnum L magnetotherapy unit
1 power supply unit
1 operating manual

item.title: MAGNUM XL
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: · GAUSS POWER: 400 Gauss Peak (200 x 2 channels); 140 Gauss Average (70 x 2 channels); Adjustable power in steps of 5 · DISPLAY: a large and BACKLIT screen permits to display all the parameters. Controls are extremely easy and make the device very user-friendly · TYPE OF THERAPY: magnetotherapy device with lowfrequency pulsed magnetic fields · NEW GENERATION SOLENOID: possibility to treat pathologies in deep or superficial way thanks to its special solenoid created by Globus research in collaboration with the most important physiotherapy centers. It also permits to treat large areas such as the back or smaller areas such as the wrist · 26 PRESET PROGRAMS · 1 PROGRAMS CAN BE STORED · OUTPUT CHANNELS: 2 channels · ADJUSTABLE FREQUENCY: from 5 to 200 Hz · POWER SUPPLY: mains 220V
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Channels: 2 independent
Emitted intensity: 400 total Gauss peak;
70 Gauss average per channel
Adjustable frequency: 5-200 Hz steps of 1
DutyCycle: 5-50% steps of 1
Power supply: mains 220V
Large BACKLIT graphic display and
EASY-PRO navigation system with joypad
Class II A device
In compliance with the directive

EQUIPMENT
1 carrying case
1 flexible solenoid
1 Magnum XL magnetotherapy unit
1 power supply unit
1 operating manual

item.title: MAGNUM XL PRO
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: · GAUSS POWER: 500 Gauss Peak (250 x 2 channels); 200 Gauss Average (100 x 2 channels); Adjustable power in steps of 5 · DISPLAY: a large and BACKLIT screen permits to display all the parameters. Controls are extremely easy and make the device very user-friendly · TYPE OF THERAPY: magnetotherapy device with lowfrequency pulsed magnetic fields · NEW GENERATION SOLENOID: possibility to treat pathologies in deep or superficial way thanks to its special solenoid created by Globus research in collaboration with the most important physiotherapy centers. It also permits to treat large areas such as the back or smaller areas such as the wrist · 46 PRESET PROGRAMS · 15 PROGRAMS CAN BE STORED · OUTPUT CHANNELS: 2 channels · ADJUSTABLE FREQUENCY: from 5 to 200 Hz · POWER SUPPLY: mains 220V
item.content:encoded:
TECHNICAL FEATURES
Channels: 2 independent
Emitted intensity: 500 total Gauss peak;
100 Gauss average per channel
Adjustable frequency: 5-200 Hz steps of 1
DutyCycle: 5-50% steps of 1
Power supply: mains 220V
Large BACKLIT graphic display and EASYPRO
navigation system with joypad
Class II A device
In compliance with the directive

EQUIPMENT
1 carrying bag
2 flexible solenoids
1 Magnum XL Pro magnetotherapy unit
1 power supply unit
1 operating manual
